channel.title: Cell War Rock Food Music India on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Cell War Rock Food Music India on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: rupies crack my shit up.
item.description: last night my friends and I went to this pretty nice resturant and had excellent food and free beer. the night was advertised as “unlimited intoxication” - which seemeingly is a misnomer. what does misnomer mean? so we hung out there and I had excellent tandori chicken kabobs and lotsa fish. it all ruled oh so much. good good food. then suresh and I went to a club called spin. apparently there is only about 50 things globally that you are allowed to call a club.
